section.heading: Rules.
section.text: MPD, pursuant to subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2, may issue rules to govern the implementation of the District of Columbia Rap Back Program and to otherwise implement the provisions of this chapter.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 days) creation of this section, see § 3047 of Fiscal Year 2026 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2025 (D.C. Act 26-146, Sept. 3, 2025, 72 DCR 9623).
For temporary (90 days) creation of this section, see § 3047 of Fiscal Year 2026 Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2025 (D.C. Act 26-210, Nov. 24, 2025, 72 DCR 13514).
